name: araucaria
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an evergreen tree (= one that never loses its leaves) that has sharp, pointed leaves: The araucaria is probably my favourite tree, not least because of its common name, the monkey puzzle. A majestic araucaria stood beside the driveway.
More examplesFewer examplesThe house was hidden away behind a row of tall araucarias.If you are travelling in Patagonia, look out for the stunning araucaria trees.The spiky, needle-like leaves of the araucaria help to give its distinctive look.
